 Context: Ingredients: 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces, sea salt to taste, 1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste, 1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste, 1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder, ground black pepper to taste, 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, 1 small yellow onion, diced, 1 medium green bell pepper, diced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced, 5 cups water, 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained, 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco), 1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, 
Directions: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Place chicken in the pot; brown on all sides. 2) Season with sea salt, chili powder, cumin, ground chipotle, black pepper,  and cayenne pepper. 3) Mix in onion, green bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper. 4) Pour in about 3 cups water, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until about 1/2 the water has evaporated. 5) Mix the kidney beans, black beans, and corn into the pot. 6) Season with green pepper sauce. 7) Reduce heat to low, and mix in remaining 2 cups water and tomato paste. 8) Simmer, stirring occasionally 30 minutes, or until thickened. 9) Top with cilantro to serve.

 Context: Ingredients: 2 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into 1/2 inch strips, 3 cups chicken broth, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained, 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces, 1/2 cup salsa, 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 
Directions: 0) Heat 2 teaspoons of the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Add half of the tortilla strips, stirring often, until crisp. 2) Drain on paper towels. 3) Repeat with remaining 1/2 teaspoon of oil and remaining tortilla strips and set aside. 4) Add the broth, cumin, chili powder and oregano to the pot. 5) Raise heat to high and bring to a boil. 6) Add the beans, corn, chicken and salsa. 7) Reduce heat to low, stir and simmer for about 2 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside. 8) Add the cilantro and half of the reserved tortilla strips. 9) Ladle into individual bowls and garnish each bowl with some of the remaining strips.
conv_answer: Great. First take a large pot and heat 2 teaspoons of the oil over medium heat.

 Context: Ingredients: 12 ounces chopped raw bacon, 1 small white onion, chopped, 5 button mushrooms, chopped, 1 1/2 pounds extra-lean ground beef, 1 egg, 1/4 cup evaporated milk, 6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese, divided, 1/2 cup corn flake crumbs, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned. 2) Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels. 3) Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease. 4) Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft. 5) Remove from heat. 6) In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk. 7) Stir in the onion and mushrooms. 8) Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon. 9) Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended. 10) Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan. 11) Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour. 12) Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon. 13) Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds russet potatoes, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 egg, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg, 1/4 cup lard or other cooking fat, 
Directions: 0) Place whole potatoes in their skins into a large pot of boiling water; boil for 25 to 30 minutes. 1) Remove potatoes, and discard water. 2) When cool enough to handle, peel potatoes, and place on a lightly floured surface. 3) Mash potatoes with a rolling pin. 4) Place mashed potatoes into a large bowl. 5) Stir in flour, egg, parsley, salt, and nutmeg. 6) Knead well to form a smooth dough. 7) Then roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch. 8) Cut flattened dough into thin strips, about 1 1/2 inches long. 9) Gently roll out the strips, or stretch them until the ends taper. 10) Set aside for 15 minutes. 11) In a large skillet, heat lard over medium heat. 12) Place the potato strips into the skillet, and fry until golden brown on both sides.
conv_answer: Great. Now we can start with the recipe. First you should place the whole potatoes in their skins into a large pot of boiling water. Then boil them for 25 to 30 minutes.

 Context: Ingredients: 1/4 cup butter, 1/2 bunch green onions, chopped, 1/2 cup butter, 2 pounds frozen crawfish, cleaned, 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of potato soup, 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 4 ounces cream cheese, softened, 2 cups half-and-half cream, 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 
Directions: 0) Melt 1/4 cup of butter in a large skillet over medium heat. 1) Saute green onions in butter until tender. 2) Remove from pan, and set aside. 3) In the same skillet, melt 1/2 cup of butter, and saute the crawfish for 5 minutes; set aside. 4) In a large pot over medium heat, combine potato soup, mushroom soup, corn, and cream cheese. 5) Mix well, and bring to a slow boil. 6) Stir in half-and-half, sauteed green onions, and crawfish. 7) Season with cayenne pepper. 8) Bring to a low boil, and simmer 5 minutes to blend flavors.

Question: Ok nice. I have all the ingredients prepared. How do I start making the dish? 
 Context: Ingredients: 2 cups chopped, cooked chicken meat, 2 cups fresh chopped broccoli, 1/2 cup chopped onion, 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper, 1 1/2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 2 tablespoons Dijon-style prepared mustard, salt and pepper to taste, 1 tablespoon minced garlic, 1 (8 ounce) package refrigerated crescent rolls, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic. 1) Mix all together. 2) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 3) Cover a cookie sheet with aluminum foil. 4) Place a glass upside down in the center of the cookie sheet. 5) Roll out crescent rolls around the base of the glass, with pointy ends away from the glass; when you're finished, the arrangement will look like the sun. 6) Spoon some of the chicken mixture onto the thick part of each crescent roll. 7) Fold the pointy end of each roll over the top of the mixture and tuck in the middle. 8) Remove glass from cookie sheet. 9) Arrangement of rolls will now look like a fluted tube cake. 10) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until rolls are golden brown.
conv_answer: Good job! You now combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic in a large bowl.
target_answer: 0) In a large bowl, combine the chicken, broccoli, onions, bell pepper, cheese, mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper and garlic.

predictions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
labels: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
input:
Question: Yes I'm ready. 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 cup sliced almonds, 1/4 cup butter, softened, 2/3 cup white sugar, 1 egg, beaten, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Turn a 9x5 inch loaf pan or metal bowl upside down and cover the outside with foil. 2) Place onto a cookie sheet. 3) Stir together the flour, cocoa, salt and almonds; set aside. 4) In a medium bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. 5) Beat in the egg and vanilla. 6) Gradually stir in the dry ingredients to form a fairly stiff dough. 7) On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch in thickness. 8) Cut into circles using a glass or cookie cutter. 9) Starting at the top (bottom) of the pan or bowl, arrange cookies so they are overlapping. 10) Work toward the edges covering as much of the pan as you can. 11) Be sure to press each cookie on so you will have a good solid bowl. 12) Bake for 10 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, until cookies are firm. 13) Cool completely. 14) Carefully turn the pan over and remove the pan from the foil, then carefully remove the foil from inside the cookie structure. 15) Fill with cookie or candy.
conv_answer: Cool! You can start to preheat the oven to 175 degrees C.
target_answer: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

 Context: Ingredients: 6 russet potatoes, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 pinch salt, 
Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. 1) Drop in potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. 2) Drain, cool slightly, and peel. 3) Season with salt, then mash potatoes with fork. 4) Place in large bowl, and stir in egg and olive oil. 5) Knead in enough flour to make a soft dough. 6) On a floured surface, roll dough into a long rope. 7) Cut the rope into 1/2-inch pieces. 8) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. 9) Drop in gnocchi, and cook until they float to the top, about 3 to 5 minutes. 10) Serve with pasta sauce.

 Context: Ingredients: 3 cups crushed vanilla wafers, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 2/3 cup butter, melted, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 4 cups milk, 4 1/2 cups miniature marshmallows, 2 (3.5 ounce) packages instant vanilla pudding mix, 1 cup frozen whipped topping, thawed, 2 large bananas, sliced, 1 (1.5 ounce) bar milk chocolate candy, 
Directions: 0) Combine crushed cookie crumbs, pecans, and butter or margarine. 1) Press into a 9 x 13 inch pan. 2) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 5 minutes. 3) Cool. 4) Combine chocolate chips, 1 cup milk, and 2 cups marshmallows in a sauce pan. 5) Stir over low heat until melted. 6) Pour over cooled crust. 7) Chill for 1 hour. 8) Arrange banana slices over chilled chocolate layer. 9) Prepare pudding mix as directed on box except use only 3 cups of milk. 10) Fold in nondairy whipped topping and remaining marshmallows. 11) Pour pudding mixture over bananas. 12) Grate chocolate bar over the top. 13) Chill for 2 to 3 hours before serving.

Directions: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Stir in the onion, bell pepper, carrot, and garlic, and cook 5 minutes, until tender. 2) Mix in 1 can black beans and chicken broth. 3) In a blender, puree remaining can of beans until smooth. 4) Mix into the pot. 5) Bring soup to a boil. 6) Reduce heat to low. 7) Mix in ham, cumin, salt, and pepper. 8) Simmer 20 minutes. 9) Garnish with Cheddar cheese and sour cream to serve.
conv_answer: Yes that was all. Just garnish it with Cheddar cheese and sour cream to serve. Enjoy the soup.
target_answer: 9) Garnish with Cheddar cheese and sour cream to serve.

 Context: Ingredients: 3/4 cup shortening, 1 cup sugar, 1 egg, 1/4 cup molasses, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon salt, Additional sugar, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, cream the shortening and sugar. 1) Beat in the egg and molasses. 2) Combine flour, baking soda, ginger, cinnamon and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture. 3) Roll teaspoonfuls of dough into balls. 4) Dip one side of each ball into sugar; place with sugar side up on a greased baking sheet. 5) Bake at 350 degrees F for 12-15 minutes or until lightly browned and crinkly.

Question: Great! Should we start to prepare? 
 Context: Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups boiling chicken broth, 1/2 cup uncooked long grain rice, 1/4 teaspoon Italian seasoning, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and drained, 1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese, 1 (2.8 ounce) can French-fried onions, divided, 1 pound fresh or frozen fish fillets, thawed, 1 dash paprika, 1/2 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 
Directions: 0) In a greased 11-in. baking dish, combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder. 1) Cover and bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 10 minutes. 2) Add the broccoli, Parmesan cheese and half of the onions. 3) Top with fish fillets; sprinkle with paprika. 4) Cover and bake 20-25 minutes longer or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. 5) Uncover; sprinkle with cheddar cheese and remaining onions. 6) Return to the oven for 3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
conv_answer: Yes now we can start! First take a 11-inch. baking dish and grease it. Then combine the broth, rice, Italian seasoning and garlic powder.

 Context: Ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) bar German sweet chocolate, chopped, 1/3 cup milk, 4 ounces cream cheese, softened, 2 tablespoons white sugar, 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker crust, 
Directions: 0) Microwave chocolate and 2 tablespoons of the milk in large microwave-safe bowl on high 1 1/2 to 2 minutes or until chocolate is almost melted, stirring halfway through heating time. 1) Beat in cream cheese, sugar, and remaining milk with wire whisk until blended. 2) Refrigerate 10 minutes. 3) Gently fold in 3 1/2 cups of the whipped topping until no streaks remain. 4) Spoon into crust. 5) Freeze pie 4 hours. 6) Before cutting pie, let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. 7) Serve with remaining whipped topping.
